comment: Good flavor with a vanilla/Smokey finish that is not harsh on the aftertaste
Very Sweet Vanilla Flavor. Make a coke taste like Vanilla Coke

Very sweet with a mild vanilla and spice taste. Would probably taste a lot better if it were aged longer. Definitely tasted better on the rocks and the wife enjoyed very chilled. I don’t I will purchase again. 
Too bad, as I loved the concept of it being owned and ran by veterans.
Hints of vanilla and caramel. Not a pricey whiskey but good for a Monday evening.
Terrible. On course for the worst bourbon I’ve had
